name: @ssttevee/u8-utils
description: Miscellaneous functions for working with Uint8Arrays

scripts.build: tsc && mv lib/index.js lib/index.mjs && mv lib/index.js.map lib/index.mjs.map && sed -i 's/index.js.map/index.mjs.map/' lib/index.mjs && sed -i 's/index.js/index.mjs/' lib/index.mjs.map && tsc --module commonjs

author: ssttevee
